name: Torch Prediction Market Kit
description: Autonomous vault-based prediction market bot for Torch Market on Solana. Creates binary prediction markets as Torch tokens â€” the bonding curve provides price discovery, the treasury accumulates value from trading fees, and the vault manages positions. Each market has an oracle (price feed or manual) and resolves at a deadline. The agent keypair is generated in-process -- disposable, holds nothing of value. All SOL routes through the vault. The human principal creates the vault, funds it, links the agent, and retains full control. Built on torchsdk v3.2.3 and the Torch Market protocol.

env.name: VAULT_CREATOR
env.description: Vault creator pubkey -- identifies which Torch Vault the bot operates through. Required.

env.name: SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Disposable controller keypair (base58 or byte array JSON). Optional -- the bot generates a fresh keypair in-process if not provided (recommended). If provided, should be a fresh keypair with ~0.01 SOL for gas. Holds no value. All market capital lives in the vault.

env.name: MARKETS_PATH
env.description: Path to markets.json definitions file. Default: ./markets.json

install.label: Install Torch Prediction Market Kit (npm, optional -- SDK is bundled in lib/torchsdk/ and bot source is bundled under lib/kit on clawhub)

actions.name: TORCH_CREATE_MARKET
actions.description: Create a new prediction market -- builds a Torch token via buildCreateTokenTransaction and seeds initial liquidity via vault-routed buildBuyTransaction

actions.name: TORCH_SNAPSHOT_MARKET
actions.description: Snapshot an active market -- fetches token price, volume, holders, and treasury state via getToken and getHolders

actions.name: TORCH_RESOLVE_MARKET
actions.description: Resolve a market at deadline -- checks oracle (CoinGecko price feed or manual) and records outcome (yes/no)

actions.name: TORCH_CHECK_ORACLE
actions.description: Check oracle for a market -- price_feed fetches from CoinGecko, manual returns unresolved

actions.name: TORCH_LOAD_MARKETS
actions.description: Load market definitions from markets.json file -- file-based state, no database

actions.name: TORCH_SAVE_MARKETS
actions.description: Save updated market state back to markets.json -- persists mint addresses, status changes, outcomes

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT
actions.description: Get vault state by creator -- SOL balance, linked wallets, authority, token holdings

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_FOR_WALLET
actions.description: Reverse lookup -- find which vault a controller wallet is linked to

actions.name: TORCH_GET_TOKEN
actions.description: Get detailed token info including price, treasury state, holder count

actions.name: TORCH_LIST_TOKENS
actions.description: List tokens by status (bonding, migrated) with sorting and pagination

actions.name: TORCH_CONFIRM
actions.description: Confirm transaction on-chain via Solana RPC -- verifies signer, checks Torch instructions, determines event type. Does NOT contact SAID Protocol.
